unnormalised: Fyi matra, "Hav." mhonnllear Havildar, Bharoti Senentlo ek gazetted nhoi oxem officer. Hav. uprant, tumkam "Naik" ani magir "Lance Naik" melltta ani magir gazetted pod melltta. "Capt." mhonnllear Captain, gazetted officer, ani "Maj. Gen." mhonnllear Major General, ekdum unch podvi aslolo officer. Ugddas dovrat ki "Wg. Cdr." mhonnllear Bharoti Hawa Dalantle Wing Commander, jem Senentlea Lieutenant Colonelak soman asta. Toxench, kednaim kednaim lok "Brigadier" hem "Brig." mhonnun ukta, tenâ€™na gollunaka. He sankhepuchho sadharanponnan sarkari kagodpotrant ani sadharan uloppant vapurtat, dekhun te zanno mhotvachem!
normalised: tumchea mahitekhatir, "Havildar" mhunnttlear Havildar, Bhartiya foujent ek non-commissioned officer. Havildaracher "Naik" ani magir commissioned ranks-ak pavche adim "Lance Naik" asta. "Captain" mhunnttlear Captain, ek commissioned officer, ani "Major General" mhunnttlear Major General, ek unch podvi aslolo officer. Ugddas dovrat ki "Wing Commander" mhunnttlear Bhartiya Air Force-ant Wing Commander, foujentlya Lieutenant Colonel-achea soras. Toxench, kednaim kednaim "Brigadier"-ak "Brigadier" mhunn sankshepant vapurtat, dekhun bhonvonakant poddonakat. Hi sankshipt rupam sadharanponnan sarkari kagdot ani ajun porim sanvadant vapurtat, dekhun ti zannastolem borem!
